availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, merchant and hotel keeper. Casey County, Kentucky native. Married to Mary H. Portman. Married to Eliza Linsford Portman in 1866. Father of Josephine Portman, Kate B. Portman, Joel Portman. Merchant in Lincoln County in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Lincoln County in 1850. Hotel Keeper in Lincoln County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 1 p. 228.
